Room.Name: North Oceancrest Post Office #19
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the many postal facilities in Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: In order to better serve the people of Oceancrest, the postal system was enacted to provide superior communications between various people in the city. Because of the vast size the city had grown to, it became quite a task to walk from one end of the city to the other, just to visit for a few hours.
